name: The Blue Box
description:
The Blue Box is a game compilation where you can:
  • Make burgers with physics to earn minimum wage in BurgerGame.
  • Negotiate the price of food items as a llama in Llama goes to Market.
  • Realize the full extent of humanity in YWDH.
  • Race against other ostriches to escape the police in DDAFPST Ostriches.
  • Play basketball across the globe in BBA SLAM.
  • Go back in time to snap some sweet pics of creatures in Oligocene Snapshot.

Stay tuned for content updates including additional games, a museum exploration mode featuring developer commentary, and additional experiments all free of charge.
